headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: The Fourth In America. Aired 9-10p ET

utterances.speaker: BRIANNA KEILAR, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Carla (ph), you are from the D.C. area. But you're here with Valenton (ph) who is your husband. You married a Frenchman. What are you hoping to show him, tonight?CARLA (ph), WASHINGTON, D.C.: Some lovely fireworks. Hopefully it doesn't rain. And a good time. I'm here with my dad as well. So, it's a nice family moment.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: And this is your first time seeing this. What are you expecting?VALENTON (ph), CARLA's (ph) HUSBAND: Well, I expect it to be great. It's the U.S. So, the U.S. usually do it like very big and very -- very great. So, I expect -- expect the best.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: A very fun couple, considering the story of our independence.VALENTON (ph): Yes.
